name: RPS Saga
description:
Easy and strategic Dual game applied with Rock, Scissor and Paper Rule.
It’s time for the legendary heroes to be reunited.

After winning the war against the evil tribe, 10 heroes spread out to various locations due to different opinions. Moreover, the kingdom was divided and ruled by 10 heroes.
As incomplete peace continues, Ashtan detects ominous dark energy and goes to find old colleagues to eliminate it.


- Easy and fun combat using RPS rules
- 10 playable heroes each with unique skills
- Various skills that gain the advantage in the game
- Mysterious storyline
- Campaign mode : More than 50 stages
- Charge mode : Challenge for the highest score with all heroes you have
- Survival mode : Test how long you can survive
- Unique gimmicks in each chapter
- Outstanding retro pixel art
- Dozens of achievements ans leaderboards
